Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
Creation date : 10-05-2006
29.10.2013 JH SCR18471 Changed parameter pi.Subject in call of GM102 in BAD151 DayRof
26.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
16.05.2012 GB SCR17262 Removed the thousand separators in the amounts columns
09.05.2012 JH SCR17262 Added cloumn CLNT806_ING_GRID_NR
11.07.2011 SH SCR16585 Used now ADMN_BAD151_DIRECTORYPATH to store files
if PI.ADMNO > 0 instead of GNRD_DIRECTORYPATH(GNRD_DIRECTORYTYPE = 85)
11.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
05.11.2010 GB SCR15950 Added GNRD_DIRECTORYPATH (GNRD_DIRECTORYTYPE = 85) if
PI.ADMNO > 0
09.09.2010 GB SCR15777 Added the parameter PI.ADMNO
29.07.2009 GB SCR14759 Added fields CDTO_VORTEX_ADMNO, CDTO_VORTEX_CLNTNO
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
05.06.2008 GB SCR13697 Changed arrangement fields in detail line
13.07.2007 GB SCR 12598 Changed model PI.DATE from date on alpha/added variable
v.pi.DATE and convert PI.DATE on v.pi.DATE
08.07.2007 GB SCR 12598 Daily Report On Factoring/ call task ExistRowInCDTO
change update v.file_name_and_path expression
trim(v.file_name_and_path)& 'DAYROF'&DStr(v.GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE,'YYYMMDD')&
'_'&TStr(Time(),'HHMMSS')&'.CSV' on
trim(v.file_name_and_path)& 'DAYROF'&DStr(pi.DATE,'YYYMMDD')&
add parameter pi.DATE and update pi.DATE = GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE
if pi.DATE = 0 and Select all CLIENT_DAILY_TOTALS rows where
CDTO_DATE = PI.DATE
... use ADMN_BAD151_DIRECTORYPATH
GET SYS TEMP PATH (42)
v.parameters_supplied? is for future use - right now there are no mandatory
parameters. therefore update v.parameters_supplied? always with 'true'
update v.pi.DATE = GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE if isnull(v.pi.DATEE) OR pi.DATE = ''
get factor-link postmaster e-mail address
call task ExistRowInCDTO

STP.TXT: M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R / S
GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 42) I S E M P T Y

Text.val: ... convert file to BU encoding (error handling is implemented in GB324)
